title: What is the correct interpretation of salt in a dream?

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of salt in dreams. Salt is considered one of the most important ingredients that goes into preparing all foods. It is also used in popular cultures to get rid of envy, the evil eye, and negative energies, and water and salt are used for the same purpose, but what the dream indicates and what are the circumstances in which it occurs, you will learn in this article from the encyclopedia of everything related to the dream of salt. Interpretation of salt in a dream The symbol of salt in a dream says Ibn Sirin said that seeing salt in a dream indicates piety and asceticism in this world. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating bread and salt, this vision means that this person wants the afterlife and does not want anything from the enjoyment of this world. Whoever dreams of giving salt to someone, this dream means that the one who took The salt will get money soon, and if the one who takes the salt is a friend of the dreamer, then this vision symbolizes love and good feelings between them. Among the bad dreams: whoever sees that he finds salt, then this vision means that he will suffer from illness or distress. Interpretation of spraying salt in a dream for a single woman is one of the different visions. It is pleasant for an unmarried girl to see in her dream that she is eating food and it was very salty, and this dream means that that girl will get married and live a difficult and bitter life. And if she sees that she is washing with salt, then this vision indicates that there are tensions in the emotional relationship that she is living and also that there are multiple problems. Between her and her partner. And the unmarried girl who sees that she is eating salt in her dream, this dream is one of the unpleasant dreams, as it indicates that this girl will be associated or married to a person who will be miserable and that her life with him will be surrounded by difficulties. And problems due to his stinginess. Buying salt in a dream: One of the dreams that brings good news to the dreamer is that he sees in his dream that he is buying salt or he sees salt falling from the sky. This dream means that if the dreamer is poor and in distress, then God Almighty will remove his worries and sorrows and receive money that will relieve him and his distress will go away. Whoever is sick and sees this vision, this indicates that God Almighty will heal him. Bathing with water and salt in a dream. One of the promising visions in a dream is to see a person bathing with water and salt. This person will suffer from some worries and problems and will be able to overcome them, God willing, and he will also be able to reach . Rest after fatigue. But if the dreamer of this vision is a woman, then it does not bode well for her, as it indicates that she will face many problems. It is said that if he sprinkled salt on one of the body’s organs, and he was afflicted with a disease, then he will be treated. Interpretation of salt in a dream about the dead: a person who Dreaming that a dead person gives him salt, this dream symbolizes that the dreamer has serious disagreements with someone and that he will break off his relationship with the person who is different from him. It is said that seeing dead people giving salt in a dream means that the dreamer will leave a family member due to disagreements between them or They will travel to a far place and will not be able to meet again after their travel. Interpretation of sprinkling salt on a person in a dream. Seeing salt in a dream is a promising vision for a person

title: Breastfeeding a child in a dream for great interpreters 2021

preview.html: Breastfeeding a child in a dream is one of the dreams that many people want to know its interpretation and whether it indicates good or bad. Therefore, you are presented with a different website. In this article, an explanation of the interpretation of breastfeeding a child in a dream, according to the social status of the dreamer. Breastfeeding a child in dreams. Senior interpreters see that breastfeeding a child in a dream is one of the visions that express the solution of problems and the removal of worries that the dreamer suffers from. , unlike seeing in a dream that he is breastfeeding a young man or an old man. This dream indicates extreme anguish and sadness that will invade her life. Seeing a child being breastfed in a dream expresses the new relationship between the dreamer and that child’s family and also indicates that the dreamer is reaching her stomach in real life. If a woman sees in a dream that milk is coming out of her breast without A baby is breastfeeding until her clothes are wet. This dream is not a promising dream, as it indicates that she will face many crises and turmoil. Real life. If a woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding a baby girl, then this dream is one of the dreams promising comfort and great success that the dreamer will achieve in her life. If a woman sees that she is breastfeeding the baby from her left breast, then this vision expresses that this woman is very emotional with both Around her, sympathetic to children, and kind to them even if they are not her children. Some interpreters said that if a woman who has been married for a while and has not given birth to a child, and sees a child being breastfed in a dream, this dream foretells to her that God will give her a child after all these years of her offspring, and then she will become pregnant. Soon, thanks to Almighty God. Breastfeeding a child in a dream by a young man is a sign of repentance, advice to the priest, and a return from lying to the straight path. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child in a dream for a single woman. A large number of interpreters tend to the opinion that seeing a child breastfeeding a single child in... The dream is not a praiseworthy vision according to most interpretations, and the doctrine in this is that seeing a boy initially in the dream is one of the visions that express worries and sorrow, especially since breastfeeding requires caring for and transporting the child, which means that the dreamer is afflicted. Talking about seeing an unmarried woman Breastfeeding a small child, as Imam Nabulsi said, is an undesirable vision that reveals the torment that the dreamer is going through or loss of interest. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child in a dream for a married woman: Filling a married woman’s breasts with milk to breastfeed the child is one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicate that she will possess great wealth, This dream indicates that she will enjoy a great status among people. If a child does not accept breastfeeding from a married woman and tries to stay away from her, then this dream means that the dreamer will face some problems and shocks in her life. If a married woman sees that a dead man came to her and gave her a child to breastfeed, and she breastfed A married woman holds a child until she is satisfied and sleeps. This dream indicates that the dreamer will do a lot of good, such as giving birth to a child, or that God will grant her

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretations of dreams about travel: Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi are considered among the greatest scholars of dream interpretation to date, which is why they mentioned these points in interpreting a dream about travel. Travel means change and moving from one state to another. Interpretation of a dream that you are preparing for a trip and you see people saying goodbye to you, this means that your circumstances will witness great turmoil Travel symbolizes people's morals and attitudes. A dream of travel for a poor person means that he will be blessed and his situation will turn into wealth and he will say goodbye to a life of poverty and helplessness. A dream of travel for rich people is not very promising, it indicates loss of money and poverty. It symbolizes hardships, because the traveler feels tired and unhappy during His journey. The difficulty of traveling in a dream means that you will mate with friends who have bad morals. The ease of traveling means going with those with good morals. Traveling on foot means that you have great faith in your heart. Dream of traveling for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream the condition of traveling, this means She is unstable in her family life, and it symbolizes the exhaustion and hardships that she brings to her family and prevents her from searching for a living for her family. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for single women: A single woman’s travel is considered a good thing, because it means a change in her situation, and she can find a new job or a future marriage, and in general, travel With a single woman it means changing her life for the better. Interpretation of a dream of intention to travel: If you only plan to travel in your dream but do not travel in reality, then this dream means that you are looking for a living in reality, but there are some people or things that stand before you to achieve your dream. You may intend to apply for a new job or undertake a new project, but there are things or people who spoil your search, and this dream is a warning to you, so you should review your assumptions well, review things, and pay attention to people. Who are worse than your competitors or close friends? Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s trip: A man was created to endure hardship and strive to provide money for his family. If a woman sees that her husband is traveling, this is evidence of that husband’s striving and searching for a source of livelihood for his family. Your husband is nice, does a good job, and thinks a lot about his family.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s close relationship with someone I do not know in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of intimate relationship for a single woman with someone I do not know. Many search for the interpretation of dreams of intimacy for individuals from someone they do not know, and dreamers often have some anxiety about visions and want to get the correct interpretation of their vision for reassurance. Interpretation of the practice of intimate relationship for single people. There is a large number of girls who They would like to know the interpretation of a dream about one intimate relationship with someone I do not know. DifferentNext: If an unmarried girl sees herself involved in intimate relationships in a dream, according to the interpretation of only some scholars, she will have a high status. All dreams of intimate relationships largely indicate how advanced a person is, In addition to the appearance of many important things that will change his life for the better. In the event that an unmarried girl sees an end to the practice of intimate relations, the interpretation of this is that she will gain status and promotion at work. The interpretation of dreams of an intimate relationship of an unmarried woman with someone she does not know is often evidence of The nearest date for her wedding. The dream of an unmarried woman having an intimate relationship is evidence of some strong changes in her life. When an unmarried girl sees that she has an intimate relationship in a dream, it means that she will have many opportunities that she is supposed to commit to. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dead person who gives banknotes from neighbors to unmarried people in a dream? Watching the practice of intimate relations. Most often, the interpretation of dreams about intimate relationships with unmarried women indicates the dominant status of this girl at that time. When a single girl sees in a dream that she has a close relationship, the interpretation of this is She wants to release her energy, but on the ground. A large number of girls feel anxious when they see such dreams, but this does not mean that their interpretation is bad. A dream about intimate relationships for unmarried women may indicate that God will soon give her a good husband. In many cases The dream of having an intimate relationship with one girl indicates the feelings that the girl is going through in her life. If the girl dreams of this dream, this means that she will change in her love life in reality. This dream may indicate that the girl loves herself, in addition to her desire to feel happy. Big. This dream is strong evidence of her desire to live freely, as the girl does not like restrictions that eliminate her freedom. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone drowning in a flood in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a person drowning in a torrent in a dream There are many meanings regarding the interpretation of a dream of seeing a person drowning in a torrent in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters, and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone drowning in a flood in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone drowning in a flood in a dream could be a sign that you have fallen into temptation, and God knows the unseen. When you see him drowning in a flood in a dream, it may mean losing his glory, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in a flood. A flood in a dream, it may express a disagreement in religion, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen drowning in a flood, this may lead to corruption in her family, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband drowning in a dream could indicate problems, and God Know the unseen, since if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband drowning in clean water, this may lead to good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see yourself drowning in clear water in a dream, this can be evidence of achieving goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express happiness, And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a workplace being flooded in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a workplace being flooded in a dream. We may not have found specific meanings for it among scholars, but seeing yourself drowning in a dream could be a sign of crises, and God knows best. When you see a married man drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of sadness, and God knows the unseen. When you see A single girl drowns in a dream, then she may have been convicted, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a sister’s house sinking in a dream. If the dreamer saw the sister’s death drowning in a dream, then perhaps it is a sign of marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a sister’s house sinking in a dream could lead to trouble, and God knows best. When you see Your sister’s house is drowning in a dream, this may indicate the dangers surrounding it, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the sister drowning and crying for her in a dream, it may be a sign of judgments, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a stranger who drowned and died in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a stranger who died by drowning in a dream. Perhaps death by drowning indicates On the enemies, and God is All-Knowing, as it may refer to the enemies who are planning to establish it, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in a dream, this may be evidence that he is indulging in sin and disobedience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees death by drowning, he may turn away from the path of truth, and God knows best. The unseen. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a family drowning in a dream. The drowning of a relative could indicate trouble, and God knows best. When you see your relatives drowning, it may be a loss of money, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her relatives drowning in a dream, this may indicate bad things, and God knows best. The greatest and most knowledgeable: If a married woman sees her relatives drowning, this may be a sign of sin, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of drowning and pronouncing the Shahada in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about drowning and the Shahada in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about flying and escaping from someone

preview.html: In order not to prolong your time, let us learn more through our website, the interpreter of the dream of flying. Interpretation of a dream of flying and escaping from someone Interpretation of a dream of flying and escaping from someone in a dream is evidence that the dreamer cannot face his problems. He always prefers escape or temporary solutions. This vision also expresses salvation from a great evil that almost befell the dreamer. But thanks to God, the visionary can avoid this evil and save himself. Flying and escaping from a person in a dream. A sign that the dreamer is trying to get rid of an uncomfortable relationship in his life, perhaps friendship or love. See also: Interpretation of a dream of flying without wings Interpretation of seeing flying in a dream for a single girl Seeing an unmarried woman flying from the roof of her house to the roof of another house in a dream is good news about her marriage soon. Flying high in the sky without reaching a specific destination is evidence of distraction and confusion in life. And whoever flew in her dream to a specific place and reached it, this is good news that her dreams will come true, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream for a married woman Flying over the river in a dream for a married woman is a beautiful vision that expresses the abundance of good deeds in life The dreamer. Seeing yourself flying high and then falling to the ground in a dream is evidence of a serious illness, but you will recover from it by the grace of God. And whoever sees her husband flying out of the house, and arriving at another place, it is a sign of his marriage to another woman, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing flying in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing flying in a dream about a man and its meaningIf a person sees in a dream that he is flying easily and walking without fear and obstacles. It is a good sign of elevation, abundance of blessings, and freedom from the worries and problems of the world. When a man sees that he is flying over his bed. It is a dirty vision that indicates fatigue and illness that afflicts the dreamer, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing flying in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretationSeeing flying in a dream is considered one of the most beautiful visions for a pregnant woman. It represents easy childbirth, quick recovery, and the joy of the newborn. Interpretation scholars say that seeing birds of prey flying in the sky is a sign of the birth of a male. title: What is the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about a dead bullet?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about shooting a dead person. Seeing murder raises panic and anxiety for many people, as its interpretation varies according to its meanings. Interpretation of dreams about shooting a dead person, if the fortuneteller is the murdered or killed person. Interpretation of seeing murder in a dream. Killing in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions, as its content revolves around conflicts. The internal problems that the dreamer faces are major psychological problems. VariousWe will show the connotations of murder in a dream. If someone sees in a dream that he is killing someone close to him, this indicates the death of a member of the dreamer’s family. If the dreamer kills a child in a dream or a disabled person, this is evidence of his grief. And his sadness. But if the fortuneteller dies in his dream, this indicates that there is a great danger surrounding him that he wants to eliminate. If the dreamer kills someone in a dream, and knows him in reality, this indicates that the dreamer hates the person who was killed. Interpretation of dreams about shooting a dead person, for good and good. Scenes. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about killing with a knife in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a gun in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about shooting a dead person. The dreamer feels that he is killing out of anxiety and fear, because it is forbidden, as there are many types of killing, including premeditated killing, in addition to suicide. We will explain the interpretation of dreams about shooting a dead person. Its interpretation is different. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dreamer being killed by a bullet and seeing the bullet itself indicates goodness in general, that is, the type of weapon from which the bullet was fired. Likewise, whoever sees himself killed with a weapon, this is a good thing and a lot will be obtained by the dreamer. Ibn Shaheen believed that killing with a weapon is better for the killer and the victim. If he sees an unmarried woman shooting someone, this is evidence that he will meet a person with good morals, and if he is killed, this is evidence that he will marry her because he is in love with her. If a woman dreams that she is killing her husband with a gun and she does not give birth to him. This vision is good news that she is pregnant by him. As for the pregnant woman who was seen holding a weapon to kill her husband, if he dies she will give birth to a female, but if she is alive then she is carrying a male child. The interpretation of seeing a man killing his wife states that he will pollute her inheritance, or that this will be A reason for his work, and indicates the smoothness of life between them. What happened to escaping from murder in a dream? Escaping from murder in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from exhaustion and psychological fatigue. It can also indicate the fulfillment of dreams that the leader seeks. If an unmarried woman sees that she is escaping from Whoever wants to kill him and then kill him, you will find solutions to his problems and get rid of his judgments. Seeing a woman walking home with someone who wants to kill her means that there are problems occupying her mind, but if she is killed in a dream, this indicates the end of worries. If a man survives the killing, he is a source Provision for him. Interpretation of killing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that killing in a dream is the fulfillment of what is desired, and what the dreamer asks for is evidence of the blessing of life, but if he does not succeed in killing, it shows the dreamer’s suffering in his life and his many problems. Repeated killing in a dream indicates that The dreamer suffers from problems

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you an interpretation of cockroaches in your dreams. This is known as cockroaches. This is a type of insect found when crawling, including birds, and they live in places full of mud. They also live in trees, and seeing them in a dream can be a complete dream for many people, so we have collected them for you, my dear, by God. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches walking on the body? What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches flying? What is the dream of a cockroach Ibn Sirin? The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing cockroaches in a dream whole and growing is evidence of many negative issues that the dreamer suffers from in his life, and that killing cockroaches in a dream is full of visions that indicate the dreamer’s stability. Eating cockroaches in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s evil deeds, and evidence of his sins and immorality, and he must repent and return to God before it is too late, because this vision warned him. Seeing a dead cockroach in a dream is full of visions that indicate the dreamer’s distance from the actions he performs and his closeness to God Almighty, and the presence of cockroaches in the dream indicates the differences and problems in which they deal. His life. Seeing a white cockroach in a complete dream indicates the presence of a loyal friend and companion in the dreamer’s life, and a red cockroach in a dream indicates that he will hear good news in his next life, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing an insecticide in a dream complete? Why do cockroaches dream about women? The bad: A dream about cockroaches for an unmarried woman, Ibn Sirin, and those cockroaches were alive, and this indicates her separation from her lover or brother-in-law, and the cockroaches approaching her during sleep. The interpretation of the dream revolves around large cockroaches, and the girl fought with them in the dream completely. This vision shows her that she will get rid of enemies in the afterlife, and this is evidence of her distance from an inappropriate person. Her.The dream book about cockroaches walking on her body in a complete dream shows the presence of a spoiled man in her life and she must beware of him and be wary of him. She is afraid of cockroaches in a dream full of visions that show her extreme fear of anything. In her life, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing insects in a complete dream? Seeing cockroaches in a complete dream for a married woman. Seeing a dead cockroach in a complete dream for a married woman is one of the visions that testify to the instability of her marriage and her suffering in her life from her husband, and the presence of cockroaches in her bed is evidence of disasters. And tragedies. Machine. Area. The black cockroaches in her dream are evidence of the emergence of many problems in her life that could lead to divorce, and the black cockroaches are evidence of the presence in her life of envious people who hate her. Why did she dream that the cockroaches were flying and their color was red? See also: Why do you dream of seeing bees in A dream full of men and women. Why do you dream of seeing cockroaches for a pregnant woman? What is the interpretation of seeing small cockroaches in reference to the approaching date of her birth, the intensity of her discomfort and fear of childbirth, and the intensity of her fear of the fetus? Also, cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s complete dream are evidence of a danger to her fetus and can also indicate Problems and troubles

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about burying a person alive from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about burying someone alive. Interpreters believe that interpretations differ depending on the details of the dream and the emotions of the dreamer. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a living person for single, married, pregnant women and men according to Ibn Sirin and the scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about burying a person alive according to Ibn Sirin: What is it? Interpretation of a dream about burying someone alive? Seeing a specific person being buried indicates that this person is in trouble and needs a visionary to get out of it, and the dream indicates exposure to injustice or harm from family members. If the dreamer is single and burying a stranger in his dream, this indicates He will soon marry a beautiful woman with whom he will live his most beautiful days. If the dreamer sees himself burying a child alive, the dream indicates his failure to fulfill the rights of his family, and if he is married, he will fail to raise his children and he must take care of them and they spend more time. With them. Burying a well-known and well-known man in the community is an indication that the dreamer will face some problems that may lead to his imprisonment, so he must be careful, as the dream symbolizes the accumulation of debts and the inability to do so. You pay them. Interpretation of a dream about burying a person alive by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream indicates the upcoming journey without any good in this journey and indicates the dreamer’s feeling of oppression and weakness due to his exposure to injustice and his inability to confront the oppressor. The dream portends bad luck and symbolizes that the dreamer He will fall into misfortunes and get hurt because of his reckless behavior in certain matters, but if he sees someone burying him alive, this indicates that God (Glory be to Him) will soon gain him many provisions. The dream shows that the dreamer controls his enemies and imposes his control over them. In the event that a person from the dreamer’s family or relatives is buried, the dream indicates that he will suffer from verbal abuse from this person and his inability to forgive him. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google. The Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site includes thousands of interpretations by major interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about burying a living person for a woman Singleness indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer is suffering from in the current period due to the emergence of disagreements with her friends or family. If the dreamer is living a love story in the current period, the dream leads to the failure of this relationship and her feeling stressed and upset all the time due to her partner’s inappropriate behavior. Burying the dead in an unmarried woman’s dream portends an imminent engagement, but if the dead person returns after being buried in the dream, this means that the engagement will not take place due to family disputes. Seeing a stranger buried alive is evidence that the dreamer has committed many mistakes in the previous period She needs to change herself and correct her mistakes in order for her conscience to be clear, but if she sees a dead person, she knows that she came and then comes back to life, then buries him while he is alive, then the dream indicates marriage to relatives of the dead person. Interpretation of a dream about burying a living person for a married woman in the event that The dreamer of burying an unknown person in her dream, and attending his funeral and wearing black clothes, this may indicate her bad mood and her failure to

title: Interpretation of praying in the bathroom in a dream - I saw myself praying in the bathroom in a dream

preview.html: Dream of praying in the bathroom for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, praying in the wrong place, or facing the Qiblah, and praying in the bathroom on the roof for Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq and others Interpretation of seeing prayer in the bathroom in a dream for Ibn Kathir, praying in a dream is one of the beautiful and wonderful dreams that a large percentage of us dream of, which carries a lot of good news and evidence for the dreamer, as prayer is an essential pillar of religion and one of the five pillars of Islam of complete importance, and a person’s Islam is not complete without performing prayer, especially on time. Allah Almighty ordered Muslims to perform five daily prayers, which are Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha and Fajr, which must be performed by the Messenger of Allah, may God bless him and grant him peace. Interpretation of praying in the bathroom in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is praying in the bathroom slaughterhouse, this indicates the corruption he commits and it is said that the boy offended him. Seeing prayer in the bathroom is evidence of the great corruption committed by the dreamer. Below we take a look at the interpretations of seeing prayer in a dream by the interpreter Ibn Kathir, which are interpreted by knowing the full details of the dream and the person’s situation. Interpretation of prayer in a dream Seeing an imam praying with people is evidence of the victory of the enemies. And the imam of the people in a dream is evidence of his entitlement to the state, and if he turns to the Qiblah and prays with them, it is evidence of the goodness of his condition. Supplication while standing and sitting is evidence of not lagging behind his right. Asking for forgiveness in a dream is evidence that a person will have a son. And praying in a dream is evidence that she gave birth to a son, as God Almighty says: “When she called upon her Lord a secret call.” Praying to God in the dark is evidence of salvation from sadness. Good supplication in a dream is evidence of good religion. Qunut in supplication is evidence Obedience to God Almighty. Worshiping other than God Almighty is evidence of destruction. Worshiping God Almighty, a night to gain enemies, repentance from sin and earn money. Worshiping God Almighty on a mountain is evidence of his victory with an invincible man. Praying with men and women in a dream is evidence of judicial authority among people and he was worthy of it. Praying with women in a dream is evidence that he will take over the affairs of the weak. And the imam of the people next to him, and denies his position, and does not read in his prayer, is evidence of his death while people are praying for him. Seeing a man leading prayer is evidence of her death. Seeing prayer in a dream Sitting in prayer without an excuse in a dream is evidence of not accepting his work. Praying sideways in a dream is evidence of illness. Praying on the roof in a dream is evidence that people are improving. Praying in a dream is a sign of good coming to a person, in terms of religion and worldly affairs, and achieving the state. Praying in a dream is evidence of the entitlement of religion and the return of trust. Farm prayer is proof of the end of debt. Praying without bowing is evidence of preventing the obligatory zakat. Praying the Kaaba is evidence of the integrity of his religion. Praying the east is evidence of His involvement in lying. Seeing prayer with his back to the Qiblah is evidence of rejecting Islam. Friday prayer in a dream is evidence that he will travel on a good trip. Dhuhr prayer in the dream
